1.content:
You wake up one day and notice that not in his room, at least not in his bed but in a metallic floor, and you can not see where this lack of light, but after your eyes adjust you notice that you're in a kind of corridor walls, ceiling and floor metallic.
It seemed that you're in a giant ventilation duct, but you think. "That would be impossible"
You get to explore the place until you come across a light coming on one wall, you come into the light and see huge crates on the wall, but you can easily switch between them, entering the new room you come across that everything is giant, you're in a ...
1.title: The New World.

11.content: You were surprised, you walk out of the vent and realize you're in some kind of giant bedroom. You walk out and see a bed that looks like the size of a mountain. Suddenly you hear snoring. You should've guessed that somebody lived here and from the sound of it, it was somebody big. You walk up to the side of the bed and see a hanging blanket and decide to climb it up. You feel like an insect as you crawl upwards and you think it takes you some twenty minutes to get to the top. When you finally do so, you look in surprise and see that not only was someone titanic in bed, but this somebody wasn't even human but looked animalistic. You take a closer look to see that it is in fact...
11.title: Bedroom

choices: Flicks you over to his left side.
111.content: You do a double take as you lay your eyes on the being, your vision is filled with the colors black, brown, and white as you try to comprehend what you are exactly staring at. Before you looks like a human, but with a German shepards head and a body covered in half inch fur. He s'mores soundly as you examined more closely. You could tell it was a he even though he slept on his stomach by his build which was quite thick. You were next to his thighs, cautiously working your way towards his head, all the while examining his features. His thighs told he ran a lot, as did his large butt. You decide it might be quicker to hike across him rather than climb over the countless wrinkles along his bed sheet. You grab into his short fur, which was still a quarter of your size since you guessed you were 2 inches, and quickly clamber up his thigh. Once on top you are stunned by something else, he has a tail! It was drooped sideways to the left and began an inch above his butt. Looking between his thighs that were slightly pulled apart. You see a large pair of fuzzy balls coming from underneath him. You swallow hard and continue up his thigh to his right cheek. The flesh caves in slightly as you crawl up it's massive girth, looking left to see what seemed to be a very deep crack. You were so awed by its depth that you failed to see his right hand coming up to scratch the slight irritation you have caused him. You look right just as the hand...
111.title: A male German Shepherd

choices: To the kitchen it's breakfeast time
Outside Time to go on a morning run
1111.content:
The German shepherd raises you up to his muzzle. However due to the size difference it feels like you Chuck Yeager breaking the sound barrier. Your ears are ringing when you turn a round and see a 200ft muzzle with fangs and teeth that put Godzilla to shame. " This is the end i"m a piece of dog kibble to him so much for man"s best friend!" You think to your self. However the end doesn't come. You slowly open you eyes and see his nose sniffing to catch you scent. The force is like getting being sucked up by a humongous tornado. After a few sniffs you fall softly back onto his paw. You see that he has placed his large brown eyes on your minuscule form.

You look up into his eyes which feels like a epic staring contest. The silence is broken is when the large canine speaks. " Hello my little friend!" You almost fall on your butt in shock. " You, yyyoooouuuu can talk?!" You reply in shear amazement. " Yeah I can talk all creatures can talk not just the selected few." He barks back. Your embarrassed and reply. " Well where I come we have canine like you except they walk on all fours and they only bark, howl, or growl." He cocks his head to the side and seems to take in the information you passed on. " Well lets start on the right foot, or paw as it were. My name is Riptide whats yours?" " My name is _______ ( Your name of choice here). " Well it's nice too meet you and with that he releases his huge tongue which seems like a pink interstate highway. Your not scared due to how loyal German Shepherd are,,but startled when the huge muscle rolls over you body. Saliva gets all over your body, which drenches your clothes. It feels like your being hit by a huge muscular water slide but it's not water but drool. The next lick takes off your clothes and are swallowed by Riptide. The licking continues for a couple more times which feels like hours to you. After your completely drenched riptide pulls his muzzle away from you.

" Well your a nice little friend with a sweet taste." " Thanks" You reply trying to get some of the drool out of your eyes. Riptide chuckles to himself and barks: "your like a little human puppy, hey that's what you can be my little human puppy!!" Now carrying you on his head he goes to the door.

The question is where does it go to?
1111.title: Grabs you

choices: Big brother Blaze is a giant with a giant heart to boot.
11111.content:
Riptide opens the door of his bedroom and your mouth drops in shock at how his home situated and similar to the houses you had. Your view only lasts for a few moments as the giant German Shepherd walks into his kitchen side of the living room. He places you on the table where you lean up against the tree sized pepper shaker. You look up to see the dog placing two pans upon the stove top and some pieces of bread into a toaster. It's this time Riptide pipes up " Oh yeah just to let you know I have a big brother that lives here with me!" " I'm making a breakfast for the both of us he should be getting up pretty soon." Your mind races in worry " Your brother is he just like you or is he a monster?" " Oh no he's not a monster in that he would devour you right where you stand more along the lines of he a monster in how strong and big he is." " He makes me look like a pup my head reaches just past his elbow." you try to draw a picture of such a beast in your mind. The beast from Beauty and the Beast seems to stick with you in your mind. Your brought back to reality when you hear the the sound and the smell of eggs, sausage, biscuits and gravy being made in the pans on the stove.

Your stomach emits a little gurgle, yet riptide's ears flick and the turns around and gives you a playful grin and chuckle. " So what's your brother's name if I might ask? you shout up to riptide. " Oh his name is Blaze." " What does he do for a living?" You shout back. " He works as a construction worker, and he coaches the local baseball team; The Timber Forest Wolves." " I'm the second baseman on the team." You think to your self "wow this is amazing this giant dog and from the sound of things enjoys the same sport as I do." You break yourself out of your day dream as five plates hit the table with a light thump. One has a mountain of sunny side up eggs, another has sausage piled high, yet another has biscuits smothered in gravy. Another two are blank you guess for Riptide and Blaze. The Smell drives you wild and your stomach growls loudly only this time you can hear it. " Oh it looks like big brothers up and he's hungry by the sound of it." Foods ready come on out bro.

You wait to see what comes out of the shadows from down the hall...
11111.title: To the kitchen it's breakfeast time

choices: Common interests leads to fun talks and the baseball park
111111.content:
Out of the shadows emerges a brown and white German Shepherd/ American Akita mix that would make Godzilla from the 1998 suspense film look like a garden gnome. You look at blaze's body everything Riptide told you is true. His legs showed that he too ran a lot being a working dog, His chest has a noticeable six pack and his face struck fear into you. His muzzle and maw is so huge you think that it could engulf the entire state of Texas in it. You tremble as blaze yawns and reveals his large tongue and fangs. You don't dare want to get on this dog's bad side or else you fear you might get a terrifying up close encounter with those fangs inside that maw that pulverizes chow on a daily basis and with the athletic build both Riptide and Blaze have they must eat a lot to keep in top physical condition.

"Ahhh gooood moooorning little bro your a little more perky than usual this morning." "Nope I'm just the same old me just like every morning." " Oh really" and with that he grabs Riptide by the neck and gives him a light ruffle on his head and gives him a playful lick on his head as well. " Okay Okay foods all set and on the table." Blaze comes over the table and pulls out a chair and sits down " This is quite the spread you made no wonder dad and mom think you should go to culinary school." " Aw shucks some one has to be the one to take of the spatula and spoon while the other pays the bills to this place." Riptide replies. They both sit down at the table and start to dig in. Unfortunately Riptide has completely forgotten to tell Blaze about you due to being lost in chowing down.

You on the other hand notice blaze's large fluffy tail wag as he sits down. Riptide takes his place across from his big brother. Your caught in the middle of two large, hungry canines that are prepared to go to town on the food set out before them. You take a small breath and try to look for some place high to try and get their attention. You notice the basket of biscuits is close by so you walk on over and begin to climb the mesh exterior of the basket. You begin to wave arms when a slight misstep causes you to fall into the basket of biscuits. You try to get your bearings when a large brown and white paw grabs the biscuit you've fallen on. Your hoisted up into the air and you land on a yellow white surface which was a plate. Then your covered in a brown thick substance. " It's gravy." You tell yourself then the next thing you see is a giant fork spears the biscuit and lifts you and the biscuit up high. You start to freak as you see blazes's enormous maw come into view. You think to yourself that your going to have your close encounter with blaze's mighty jaws sooner then you thought. Blaze's tongue licks his lips and he brings his mouth closer to the fork thats when you summon all your courage to scream at the top of you lungs. " Pllleeaasee Dooonnn"ttt EAAAT MEEEE!!!!!" This causes Blaze and Riptide to stop eating and take stock of the situation.

Blaze reaches into the biscuit basket for another one and puts it on his plate then pours some gravy upon it. He takes his fork and spears the biscuit and brings it up to his mouth. " Another treat is about to take a one way trip to my stomach." Blaze says to himself as he licks his lips and opens his jaws around the fork when he hears a terror filled scream that causes him and Riptide to stop where they are and take stock of the situation. Blaze brings the fork up to his eyes to see what made the scream. Blaze sees your tiny form upon his fork and he almost jumps in surprise. " Rip (short for Riptide) what's this little creature doing on my food?" Riptide nearly jumps out of his chair as he races over to fill in his brother about his little friend. Blaze don't eat him he's a friend of mine I found him this morning in my bed as I woke up." " Yeah that's true!!" you shout up at blaze you eyes you suspiciously. " Well Well Well I never would've guessed that my little bro would have a even littler friend." He places you upon his muzzle as he takes the biscuit piece into his maw, which is crush into oblivion and swallowed down into his stomach. He then places you back on the table out of the way of any danger. After the meal all three of you gather in the living room to talk about how you came to being in their house and your life.

Blaze seems to take a liking towards you as he hears about your interest in baseball as well, and the really close bond you have created with his little brother. Well I guess there's nothing more then to say " welcome to the family!!!" With that he leans down to you on the pillow between Riptide and himself and gives you a friendly warm lick. Which feels like being hit by the world's biggest drool covered paint brush. You continue your conversation long into the day when it's even dark out. You are given a little bed made out of a tissue box and a blanket made out of a small patch of cloth that hasn't been used. You think your going to go to sleep by yourself when both Blaze and Riptide come into the living room carrying sleeping bags for they plan to keep you company and look after you as Riptide put it " Out little human puppy." You stay up late into the night until you just pass out due to exhaustion. Both Blaze and Riptide look down at your peaceful form and after grooming themselves and wishing each other good night the fall asleep as well. So you drift off into dream land as you lie there in a tissue box bed surrounded by two enormous canines that consider you part of their family that they would do anything to protect and look after you.
111111.title: Big brother Blaze is a giant with a giant heart...

choices: They are happy and greet you warmly as practice starts
1111111.content:
The next day comes and you awake with a feeling that you never felt in years. Which was content and peaceful. You have to blink your eyes a couple of times to get the effect of sleep out of your eyes. As you do to remember the to enormous canines that have decided to take you into their family as one of their own little pup except you being human. Anyway you get up and with Blaze's and Riptides great hearing you note the two large canines get up and looking at you expectantly with their tails wagging. Both of them lean in and give you a good morning lick and nuzzle. Soon you are picked up by blaze and sit on his shoulder. This time breakfast is not as up close and personal as the day before. You eat your fill of the western style omelettes and french toast that Riptide has made. After breakfeast you ask; " What day is it today?" Blaze replies "It's Saturday and you know what that means." As he glances over to Riptide " Baseball Practice Riptide shouts as he jumps for joy and his tail wags uncontrollably. "Yep and after that we have a game against the Chasefield Astros." Blaze says also wagging his tail. You get also get excited about seeing a practice and a baseball game between these large animals would be epic. " You perk up saying " Wow this is going to be so cool it feels like I'm going to another world series game!" At this both Riptide and Blaze look at you and their eyes go wide.

" You were at a world series game!?" Riptide pipes up. " Yes I was" you reply. " That's awesome I hope to see one if not play in a world series if our team continues to get better." Blaze then asks which world series did you see?" " Oh I went to game 2 of the 2011 World Series between the Saint Louis Cardinals (TM) and the Texas Rangers (TM)." " Really that one?!" Blaze than walks over to a trunk and pulls out a news paper will the 2011 Saint Louis Cardinals celebrating after clinching the title. " Yep that one." You look at he picture it's looks like the exact same team, players, and all of the fans are of the canine variety. " Is everyone here a canine?" You ask both Blaze and Riptide. " Not at all there are many other species of animals around here, such as cats, tigers, birds, and bats etc. You've just happened to land in a neighborhood of canines." Blaze replies. A little bit later you and both Blaze and Riptide are both in practice attire and your securely placed between Riptide's collar and his soft neck fur. " Why do you wear collars?" You ask them. Blaze answers there identification tags which act as IDs and they have bar codes that act as ways to gain entrance into buildings, and payting for items. Other than that they are just nice bling that we wear." You snuggle down into Riptide's fur as they get into the car. You continue to talk about baseball with the two of them about championships, players, brawls, and bloopers. Eventually the car reaches the Timber Forest field. You see many other canines ranging from wolves, coyotes, malamutes, huskies, akitas, foxes, dingoes, border collies, and many other breeds. Blaze and Riptide walk to the ball field where they see some of the other team mates sitting in the stands talking, while getting ready for practice. When Riptide sits down on the bench with them they say hi and then they notice a tiny human sitting in the fur of Riptide.

How do Riptide's and Blaze's friends/ team mates react to seeing you?
1111111.title: Common interests leads to fun talks and the bas...

choices: The Chasefield Astros Arrive and the game starts.
11111111.content:
Riptide picks you out of his neck fur and places you down on the bench. All of a sudden your surround by several muzzles, noses, and eyes that are looking at you intently. " Wow" " cool" Who"s this little guy?" Your knocked onto your knees with the sudden attention and all the muzzles and the questions being thrown at you. " Easy give him some air guys don't smother him!" Riptide barks out to his team mates. They pull back giving you a chance to catch you breath. " Now guys this is ____ ( Your Name of Choice here) Go easy on him he's only gotten used to me and Blaze right now don't overwhelm him." You get a chance to catch your breath and look up to see who Riptide's friends and team mates are. You notice only about eight canines are looking down at you. While the others our already on he field stretching and getting ready for practice. There are two american akitas, two Timber wolves, an Alaskan husky, a border collie and two Alaskan malamutes. one of the malamutes is putting what looks like catcher's equipment on and you notice how strong he is. You guess a big strong breed must be a catcher due to the punishment that position dishes out.

Riptide introduces the group of canines your encircled by. "The two Akitas are Reeces and Oreo due to their mix of white/ brown and white/ black fur, also they play first and third base." " Hello it's nice to meet you little dude!!" The two akitas say giving you a friendly lick. "The border collie is named Scott because he's from Scotland, also he plays center field" "Hello laddie you've been keeping a eye on our captain have you now?!" He offers you a paw to shake you grab a finger and shake it. "The two malamutes are Kodi and Koji they play Right field and Catcher" " Nice to meet you dude." They offer their paws in a fist bump manner which you comply. "The two wolves are Jeff and Matt they our shortstop and our left fielder." The two wolves lean in and sniff you a few times then they both give you warm licks. " It's nice to meet a little creature that shares the same joy in the sport we love." Jeff howls. Lastly the husky in our group here is our closing pitcher Trent. " Nice to meet you" he says while nuzzling you with his muzzle. you take this moment to pet him which results in his tail wagging and him panting happily.

" OK boy's now that introductions are done why don't you guys get ready to stretch then work on fielding and pick offs." Blaze shouts to the canines You are picked up by blaze and sit in between his collar and fur. If you thought Riptide's fur was thick and soft Blaze's was like being in a forest of pillows by how thick and comfy it is. "There a good bunch of pups." you say to him. " Yep they have been good players on and off the field and they look after each other." " Who's the starting pitcher?" you ask. " That's Travis he's a coyote who has a good sinker, curve ball, and a screwball." " How come he didn't say hi like the others?" " Oh he's very shy don't worry about it though he's sure to come around to you." After the pups finish stretching and loosening up they take up defensive positions. You look out and see that there is at least nine other canines that you haven't meet yet and they equally excited to be playing.

Blaze grabs a bat and walks up to the plate and starts to hit grounders to the infielders while you look and you see two large canines the same size as blaze. A Dingo and a Alaskan husky they must be other coaches of the team you think to yourself. Your assumption is correct when you see them wave to Blaze and come over to their friend. Where they introduce themselves to you as Kirby and Rob. Soon practice begins and the pups show off their skills.

You are amazed at how they play and wonder how they would fair in a game...
11111111.title: They are happy and greet you warmly as practice...

choices: It's a strike and the game is on Yeah!!!!1
111111111.content:
The Chasefield Astros arrive via bus. They are all canine players as well except that their coaches are felines all of them are tigers. They coaches give a little wave to blaze and his staff as their players get onto the field. Your'e still on blaze's neck as his team comes off the field and heads to the dug out. All the canines war their tails and pant with anticipation. "Alright guys were going up against last years champions. I know the upcoming task will be daunting but the important thing is to have fun!" They all yip with excitement. That's when you get caught up in the moment and shout out; " Win every inning and remember pain is temporary it can last for a minute, an hour, or a day or even a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take it's place, but if I quit however it will last forever!!!" All the canines look at you and they howl with excitement even Trent the coyote gives you a little smile. Soon the canines take the field.

You remain with blaze as he and the manager of Astros (TM) meet and exchange line up cards with the umpires the Tiger named rick offers a finger from his paw which you shake as well as the umpire crew. Soon your in the dugout with blaze as the game begins.


You shake with excitement as the first pitch comes from Trent..
111111111.title: The Chasefield Astros Arrive and the game starts.

choices: To the Ice Cream Shoppe team trip
To Riptide's and Blaze's house team sleep over
1111111111.content:
Travis seems to take you and blaze's message to heart and uncorks his first pitch towards home plate. It has an awesome trajectory and it cuts down and out to the right side of the strike zone. The corgi batting seems to get very nervous and he swings. " Strike one" the doberman who is the home plate umpire shouts. Travis proceeds to strike out the corgi, then gets the next two batters to pop out to third in foul territory, and then makes the next ground out to short. The inning ends with the wolves keeping the Astros scoreless. " Good job guys that's a good start but there's still a lot of baseball to be played." During the bottom half of the inning you climb down blaze's arm and sit next to Travis.

" Nice pitching out there!" You say to Travis. Who nearly jumps out of his fur in surprise due to the sudden compliment. He soon calms down and sits back on the bench. He leans down to you. " Why are you talking to me wouldn't you rather want to sit with the others?" " I would but it's too loud up by the front of the dugout." Trent looks down at you and gives you a smile. After a couple of hits the wolves have Scott on second base. unfortunately Jeff strikes out ending the inning. "We'll just got to hold em down defense wins you championships" you say to Travis. He gives you a smile then goes out to the mound. The next five innings go by rather quickly noted by riptide and Jeff turning two great double plays that would make Ozzie smith and Tommy herr smile. Until in the seventh inning the Astros get a single, a double and a husky walks putting runners on loading the bases with only one out. Travis Travis tries to shake it off but the next batter laces a sharp base hit down the right field line. The runner from third and second score Kodi races to the ball and picks it up and fires it back in the husky has rounded third and is headed home. Koji gets the ball and then is crashed into by the runner. You close your eyes and wince know what would happen if you were caught in such a collision. " Your'e Out!!" the Ump yells. You ask blaze if you can head out and try to lift Travis's spirits. You make your way out and Travis sees you. You ask to be lifted up to speak Koji the catcher picks you up. " Hey keep your head up don't let the other team see you with your head down then they will pounce all over you!" Travis looks up at you and his tail wags a little Koji is impressed. " Now there's two outs all we need is one out it's getting late in the game that I think they might start taking chances, so during this batter throw over to first and we'll try to catch them napping." You tell Reeces to be ready then you head back to the dugout. You watch to see what happens.

On the next play Travis fires the ball to Reeces at first and the runner is out by a mile. " Yer Out" The border collie first base umpire shouts. The team sprints off the field even though their down two to nothing. You give Travis a comforting pat on Travis's shoulder. He gives you a nuzzle thanking you for your help and encouragement. Trent is told by blaze that he will be starting the next inning. Scott leads off the inning with a single. After that he steals second base. Oreo then singles to center field and with Scott's speed he scores rather easily. Making the score 2-1 Astros in the lead. The wolves get close to scoring again, but a double play erases that hope. Trent takes the mound and you now in Travis collar shout encouragement from the dugout. After a lead of single Trent induces a double play ball then Scott makes an incredible diving catch in right center field. The game soon comes up to the bottom of the ninth. Koji leads off and works a walk. Matt doubles down the right field line and driving Jeff to third. Your and the team's spirits are high,but that is taken a hit when Jeff strikes out. Reeces then steps up and makes great contact and hits it over the 1st baseman's head Koji scores to tie and Matt tries to score but is thrown out at the plate. Riptide is the next batter. Blaze gives his little bro a pat on the shoulder. You tell him; " Don't try to hard, just make good contact and relax." Riptide takes a strike and two balls. On the next pitch he swings and crushes the ball. You all erupt when you see the ball clear the right field fence landing in the stands. You jump up and down now in blazes paw and you shout; " That's a winner, go crazy folks go crazy the wolves have won the game by the score of 3-2 on a home run by the captain go crazy!!!" Blaze, Rob, Kirby, Oreo Koji, Kodi, Scott, Jeff, Matt, Trent, Travis and the other canine look at you in awe and wonder and they all rush out to mob and meet Riptide and Reeces. Blaze, Rob, and Kirby tell you " Nice Jack buck impersonation." " Thanks" you say in reply. The mob has settled down and riptide sprints over to you and the nearly smothers you with how excited he is.Your'e petting him to congratulate him, while he licks like you just saved his life. " I did it ___( your name of choice) I did it, and it was all thanks to you he howls with joy. Soon the other team mates start to lick and thank you as well. Soon your picked up by blaze and you sit in his palm as he and both teams shake hands at he end of the game. The other team shakes your hand as well. The team has a little post game talk then they go to pack up.

The only question is where the story goes next?..
1111111111.title: It's a strike and the game is on Yeah!!!!

choices: These Canines prove that they are Man's Best Friend and live and breath Baseball
11111111112.content:
As the game concludes all the team members are still energetic after the big win. The parents of pups also come over to say hello to you. You are placed up on one of the benches up in the grand stand under the shade. All of the canines look at you with great wonder and awe. You introduce yourself and offer you hand for the parents to shake of sniff depending upon their demeanor.

The parents of the pups all seem to be very pleased with the way you conduct yourself around their offspring. All of a sudden from the huge encirclement of canines that surround you hear Riptide bring up a question that makes you a eyes go wide. Riptide asks his brother Blaze and the other adults in group, " Hey if it's alright with everybody could we all have a team sleepover?" At first your a little worried for you only been with Riptide and Blaze. Your not quite ready to be surrounded by several large canines in one place. Blaze responds with, " I have no problem with it only if the others parents don't mind." All the canines look in earnest at their respective parents. All of them nod their heads in approval. Riptide leaps up into the air like an Olympic hurtle jumper. You look up into Blaze's eyes with worry. Blaze looks down at you and lowers himself down and gives you a look that would remind you of a father that would never ever let anything happen to you as long as you lived which made your heart melt.

Riptide and the other pups look at you in excitement and you go over and jump up onto the muzzle of Riptide. You look into his eyes and you see the same heart warming, loving, protective smile. You scratch his nose to show that you have no worries about the sleep over. The whole group of canines howl and wag their tails in excitement. You are placed into Riptides neck fur as he and Blaze walk over to their jeep wrangler. Koji and Kodi come over to their family's car which is a BMW and you see they have a lot of other siblings Two older brothers and a younger sister. They see you and wave saying " See you soon little friend!" You look up at Blaze and Riptide who look at you and chuckle then reply by saying " Oh the Timber's are our next door neighbors." You shake your head and take a deep breath as the jeep drives back to the house. Riptide pets you and you soon fall asleep. The jeep arrives at the house and you all enter the house and organize the house before the other canines come over. Soon the door bell rings.
11111111112.title: To Riptide's and Blaze's house team sle...

111111111121.content:
The door bell rings and in steps Kodi, Koji, Reeces, and Oreo all four of them enter the house. Not only them you also see the Timber's older brothers as well. You are on the coffee table in the living room curled up with Riptide. When the thunder of paws on carpet wakes you up. You look up to see many large malamute, and american Akita faces staring down at you. " Aah that is just so cute!" You and Riptide both jump up in being startled. The other canines just burst out in laughter, then Scoot come flying in and lands upon the coach and nuzzles you. You pet him and then you hear those two words that makes you know what is going to come next. ( DOG PILE ) !!!!! with that all the canines jump on each other and you go jump onto the coffee table to avoid being crushed.

After a few minutes the canines climb off of each other and eventually the other members of the team comes over to you. The sleeping bags are situated all around the coffee table which has you little bed on it. You are talking about baseball stories with all the canines. Blaze brings in some home made tacos and kabobs of many varieties with other sauces and dips. You also see hot wings which makes you jump for joy. You and the canines go to town on the snacks. You do have a little mishap with a wing in which you carried your over to a bowl with ranch dip and you fall into it. You look up and you see the many canines and they take this opportunity to have a little fun with you. Koji leans in and pulls you out and licks the dip off of you with his large tongue. Then he tells you to take a breath as he dips you into the dip. Then Koji passes you around to the others who do the same thing dip, and lick process. You are laughing so much from the tongue assault.
